payload.body: Embedding latency p95 exceeded 4.2s on 2025-08-10. Any incident notes?
Our auditors need an export of go/no-go decisions and thresholds by intent.
Our auditors need an export of go/no-go decisions and thresholds by intent.
Our firewall blocks outbound except allowlisted IPs. Do you publish static egress IPs for callback webhooks?
SRE here—monitor flagged elevated 5xx from /runs API between 02:10–02:27 UTC. Root cause and mitigation?

payload.body: We hit rate limits on GPT-4o last night. Can we configure provider fallbacks?
Importing our ratings CSV returns 'Invalid schema at row 1'. The file has a UTF-8 BOM; can the parser handle it?

Hello,
We appear to have crossed the evaluation credit cap unexpectedly last week. Could you share a breakdown by model/provider and any spikes?
For audit, we need identical results when re-running with the same seed and artifacts. What are current guarantees?
We'd like to export embeddings + labels into Unity Catalog. Any sample notebook or connector?
